Recap: Marcie and Starr go to court to oppose Todd and Cole. But the judge rules that neither of them have "custodial rights" until the baby is born. Langston attempts to seduce David and has Markko videotape them in an attempt to get David in trouble with Addie. But he doesn't buy that. Jessica (as Tess) makes nice to Natalie and Jared but she secretly attempts to cut their brake lines and asks them to drive to the vineyard to get something for her. Nora and Clint have a scheme to overthrow Dorian's ownership of what was previously B.E.
